name: Proto Tower 129
description: This drawing took me forever to complete. The background pattern incorporated all of the colors and was quite granular, which made it very challenging to define a form because Gameboy color palette only has 4 colors. Bad choice... the drawing turned out pretty cool tho... I think I'll auction this one off. Also, my script keeps generating 128x128 files instead of 64x64 files. I think the script needs to account for 0 index, or something... will address later.
